website_summaries.verdict: Made up of short mini games, this one can be enjoyed by parents and kids together.
pros: Each card has a one minute game
Works as a quick break for kids
cons: It might not be challenging enough for adults without kids

customer_reviews.title: Great Homework Aid!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful fast game. My children struggle with homework, they get fidgety and distracted very easily. So we have an agreement they work very hard for 10 minutes then we play one of these breaks! We continue to do this until their homework is complete. It has made homework more fun and enjoyable and gives the kids something to look forward to.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Great game for any time frame
customer_reviews.text: My daughter (7.5 years old) and I love playing board games. We don't always have time for a full game, or sometimes she wants "just one more". So this game is perfect. We can decide to play through just 10 cards, or to play for 10 minutes, and we can have a lot of fun being creative and making each laugh.
customer_reviews.author: Susan H

customer_reviews.title: Kids Love It!
customer_reviews.text: My 2nd Grade students LOVE when I pull out the Brain Breaks. Because I use it in school, I removed all of the Sculpturades cards and, unfortunately, the sand timer doesn't work (the sand doesn't flow through the opening), so I use the timer on my phone. It just seemed like too much of a hassle to return it.
customer_reviews.author: TravelnFam

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite cranium game and I am usually a fan.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know, I didn't enjoy this. There are no directions. I know you just do what the cards say but there does't seem to be direction. We just decided that whoever won 3 first was the winner. I guess the point is flexibility but some guidance or suggestions would have been nice.
customer_reviews.author: CAT

customer_reviews.title: Fun, buuuut
customer_reviews.text: as a family that LOVES cranium, this is a sad disappointment. If you are like us, and get very competitive with your family games, then this is not the best for you... Example: roll a regular die, whatever it lands on, you have to name that many items that are in your fridge. Roll a one and say ketchup. Next card
customer_reviews.author: joseph r gilmore

customer_reviews.title: Not at all like Cranium but very good for younger children
customer_reviews.text: Not at all like Cranium but very good for younger children. Seven year old niece loved it and enjoyed all the activities. Some were challenging - writing with you toes! Would recommend to families with young children.
customer_reviews.author: zensm

customer_reviews.title: Fun for everyone!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my nephews and they loved it! There were like 100 mini games in here. Fun challenges to keep them and the whole family busy! My own kids grew up with various Cranium games, and they were always a favorite with our whole family!
customer_reviews.author: J. Graham

customer_reviews.title: We love the game Cadoo
customer_reviews.text: We love the game Cadoo, a Cranium Jr type game. Thought this one would be similar but shorter; it isn't quite. We don't play it much
customer_reviews.author: RChambers

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it. (Ages six and three
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the family to play as a dinner game. Kids love it. (Ages six and three.) Fun, simple game to play at dinner or between other games.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cranium Brain Breaks
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE Cranium Games--they are easy to play and fun! This game is a fun one to have because you can play it when you just have a minute between activities.
customer_reviews.author: prdgrandma3bdt

customer_reviews.title: Brain Breaks
customer_reviews.text: Loved it. Contains many activities that are applicable for any age. Great Brain Break material.
customer_reviews.author: dwoody

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a great deal of fun. But the kids aren't that interested.
customer_reviews.author: S. H. Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: easy, fun, entertainment
customer_reviews.text: Fun, all the family can play. You don't have to commit to a long game
customer_reviews.author: jessie phillips

customer_reviews.title: Brain Breaking Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is great. My class loves these and I teach 6-9th grade. Very creative ideas!
customer_reviews.author: Tg

customer_reviews.title: Sister game night
customer_reviews.text: So much fun and some are quite understandable that my 6 year old sister wants to join in on the fun.
customer_reviews.author: S. Jim

customer_reviews.title: kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: Cute game and very affordable. Kids have played everyday since Christmas. Fun for the entire family. I would definitely recommend this game.
customer_reviews.author: Belinda Litton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fun for a 5 minute break or as long as time allows.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Did not try the game yet.
customer_reviews.text: Have not tried the game yet. Can't figure out how to delete.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: What fun!
customer_reviews.text: Great family game with no threatening competition as teams work together. Appropriate for younger and older players, too. Our daughter-in-law wants one to use with her 4th grade class.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Rinker

customer_reviews.title: Great Family Game
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this game for my 9 year old daughter and my two god-daughters. We all absolutely enjoy playing. Very interactive game which encourages brainstorming and quick thinking. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Trini Gyal

customer_reviews.title: Good Bargain for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I was worried that this game would have enough substance to sustain 8 year olds and adults in a family game. It is relatively inexpensive and we found it to be very enjoyable.
customer_reviews.author: Lprofessor

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in the game
customer_reviews.text: Rules were very unclear and many tasks were impossible to accomplish in 1 minute, especially when it involved the modeling clay. Very disappointed in the game. Had to go buy my grandson another game which proved to be much better.
customer_reviews.author: Lynette S. Webber

customer_reviews.title: Great entertainment
customer_reviews.text: Quick games are lots of funfor the whole family. All ages can engage in a little fun even when time is limited.
customer_reviews.author: beverly outlaw

customer_reviews.title: Easy to play in minutes
customer_reviews.text: Cranium Brain Breaks is the perfect game to play if you're looking for something fun to play in a limited amount of time. All of the pieces are conveniently stored in the "brain" container. There are 200 game cards that each contain a one-minute (or less) game. Games range from sculpting things out of clay or creating words from the lettered blocks and other "traditional" games from Cranium. You can play with as little as 2 players and as many as 6 players. It's easy to set-up and is entertaining to play. I hope they offer some expansion packs for the mini-games to add more games down the line.
customer_reviews.author: Miriam Tirips

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun even with limited time
customer_reviews.text: My family likes to play board games. But most board games take a long time to set up, play and finish. Cranium Brain Breaks provides a fun-filled activity without spending too much time. You can play a few rounds or the whole afternoon - it's up to you. It's also great that the tasks can be done by both kids and adults. There's a wide variety of activities - drawing, sculpting, acting, moving around. We'll surely be bringing this around during the vacation!
customer_reviews.author: gaf

customer_reviews.title: great idea, horrible execution
customer_reviews.text: Bought this thinking it would be like minute to win it. Having played cranium before figured it was good bet. Played the game once with my family and won't be playing again. The game is difficult to finish if playing in teams. Reason why us that the directions on the cards are very vague. Many of the challenges can be short cutted because of the lack certain limitations. May work with kids, but for adults don't waste your time. Compared to dicecapades this is more frustrating than fun.
customer_reviews.author: S. Markley

customer_reviews.title: Family Fun
customer_reviews.text: My five year-old son's review: It was so fun! My kids figured out all of them. They were so happy. Happy. Happy. Happy. Happy. Happy. Happy!
customer_reviews.author: William Porto

product_meta.title: Cranium Brain Breaks Game
product_meta.description:
For instant creative fun anytime, anywhere, it’s the Cranium Brain Breaks Game! Draw a Cranium Card from the deck and complete the activity on it before time runs out. Whether you have a minute or an hour, the 200 different activities will tickle your brain! Complete word puzzles, come up with fun facts, sketch and sculpt or act and hum your best to be the winner in this fast-thinking, cranium-teasing game!

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Enjoy the full cranium experience in instant, fast-paced fun anytime and anywhere. With more than 200 games that can be played in 60 seconds or less, families race to beat the timer using classic guessing, acting, sketching, sculpting and word-puzzling skills. A fifteen-minute break is enough to make family game night happen with cranium brain breaks. With years of experience getting families to hum, act, sculpt, draw and spell their way to victory, cranium is adding “snackable” fun to the family game night menu. Cranium brain breaks includes more than 200 individual games that can be played in 60 seconds or less. Bringing families the full cranium experience in just 15 minutes. Recommended age 8 and up. Players 2 or more.
feature_bullets: Cranium Brain Breaks game challenges your ability to complete creative activities
Game includes 100 cards, 6 Cranium Cubes, die, timer, Cranium Clay and notepad

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars43 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
